sourceMeaningMnemonic: If a <radical>tsunami</radical> hits a <radical>pirate</radical> they are going to <kanji>sink</kanji> no matter how good of a pirate captain they are.
meaningInfo: Tsunamis are big. Pirates are small. Simple as that.
readingMnemonic: As the tsunami comes to <kanji>sink</kanji> the pirate, the pirate holds his <reading>chin</reading> (<ja>ちん</ja>) up high. He will die with dignity.
readingInfo: Imagine this dignified chin-holding-up-high pirate. Nod your head, because you know he got what he deserves.
